name: App Store Weekly: A Free, Weekly Email Newsletter
body:
### A free, once–weekly e-mail round-up of App Store news and apps.

One e-mail each Friday. Easy to unsubscribe. No spam — your e-mail address is safe Published by Andrey Bodoev Press and curated by Andrey Bodoev
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
